response.overview: Freddy Heflin is the sheriff of a place everyone calls “Cop Land” — a small and seemingly peaceful town populated by the big city police officers he’s long admired. Yet something ugly is taking place behind the town’s peaceful facade. And when Freddy uncovers a massive, deadly conspiracy among these local residents, he is forced to take action and make a dangerous choice between protecting his idols and upholding the law.
response.tagline: No One Is Above The Law.
response.title: Cop Land

titles.title: Cop Land: A Cidade dos Tiras

results.name: Cop Land (1997) Official Trailer 1 - Sylvester Stallone Movie
